Articles.Content:
11 minutes ago, t_v said:

But this one does. The lack of information has not been indicative of anything in the past and will probably not be in the future. You cannot reasonably say that it means that the dev team is getting close to release without relying on some sketchy assumptions

I agree, I just meant it in the sense that I knew what he meant.
Man... I just want to play this game already.

41 minutes ago, Ahres said:

Man... I just want to play this game already.

The story of my life in a sentence...

17 minutes ago, AtomicTech said:

The story of my life in a sentence...

Agreed.

1 hour ago, AtomicTech said:

The story of my life in a sentence...

Oh yes , but if the devs say anything about porting ksp mods to ksp 2 ......

I'm going to make a heat shield tiles mod but I don't know if it'll work as good in ksp 2

BTW , if someone knows modding , please help , the post link in my .... what ... aha signature.

Edited February 16, 2022 by mmamh2008
Mods are unlikely to be easily portable from KSP to KSP2. The game engine is likely too different for that.

3 hours ago, AtomicTech said:

The story of my life in a sentence...

3 hours ago, BekfastDerp13 said:

Agreed.

What do you folks think? Any hope for a release the first half of this year?

3 minutes ago, Ahres said:

What do you folks think? Any hope for a release the first half of this year?

I'd say mid-year at the earliest.

Just now, AtomicTech said:

I'd say mid-year at the earliest.

I've been holding out hope for an earlier (like April) release. I think that ship has sailed though. So I guess now my optimistic self will hang on to it coming mid-year.

I forgot to say that I contacted the KSP social media guy some months ago , I told them about :

Heat shield tiles

Multiple launchpads like the Real KSC ( confirmed maybe ?  I saw several ones )

Metallic texture ( confirmed in some kind of show and tell )

 

He said He loved the Idea and will tell the devs team.

Edited February 17, 2022 by mmamh2008
Any hype left lads?

6 minutes ago, gussi111 said:

Any hype left lads?

Somewhat.

1 hour ago, gussi111 said:

Any hype left lads?

I'm still at 100% hype level!  Feed from me, if you must.

1 hour ago, gussi111 said:

Any hype left lads?

nope ...

Do you know that I knew ksp when YouTube recommended the ksp 2 trailer , the cinematic one , I was so hyped and started playing ksp thinking it'll come soon , but ksp 2 didn't come , one day after another and no hype left .
I'm at... resigned.  Still excited about the game, but resigned that it won't be anytime soon.

2 hours ago, gussi111 said:

Any hype left lads?

Some hype. I've been way more hyped about the game than I am right now though.
It is Fridaaaaaaay!

Yes indeed, Forbidden West is out!

Toot toot mutafuhas

3 hours ago, The Aziz said:

Yes indeed, Forbidden West is out!

Toot toot mutafuhas

What is forbidden west ?

Edit : I knew what it was . but how should it affect ksp 2 ?

Edited February 18, 2022 by mmamh2008

1 hour ago, mmamh2008 said:

What is forbidden west ?

Edit : I knew what it was . but how should it affect ksp 2 ?


It doesn't. But KSP2 news have been dead for weeks, so he's probably just excited to have something new to play this friday.

6 minutes ago, Sesshaku said:


It doesn't. But KSP2 news have been dead for weeks, so he's probably just excited to have something new to play this friday.

Weeks ? it's just 2 weeks or so
hype
T-39 minutes and we will start investigation for news.

Warning: Excessive Hype Below, Moderators Beware.

Spoiler


Please anything today? Please..
